result.title: Initial design of the SDN/NFV platform and identification of target 5G-CLARITY ML algorithms
result.description: D4.1 will set the basis of the interfaces between the SDN/NFV platform developed in T4.1 and the 5G service platform considered in T4.2, as well as the AI engine developed in T4.3. D4.1 will also discuss how the various wireless access technologies, i.e. 5G, Wi-Fi, and LiFi, will be managed by the SDN/NFV platform. In addition, this deliverable will review the state of the art on ML algorithms applied to wireless access networks and will identify the key problem areas where 5G-CLARITY will focus the design of the ML algorithms.

result.title: Extreme weather patterns peport and risks map.
result.description: This Deliverable will contain: - a cover page with the title of the deliverable, deliverable number, project information (acronym, grant number, call, topic), consortium coordinator information, edition date and number; - authoring and approval data sheet, with the names of the authors, reviewers internal to the project, approval by PC, Task Leader and WP Leader, eventual rejection by any representative of the beneficiaries, and document history. - the abstract of ALARM project. - An executive summary of the Deliverable, highlighting the contributions, main results and conclusions, and some insight on how this deliverable will be feeding other tasks within the project. - An introduction to the topic, including the motivation and goals of the deliverable. - the methodological approach to the conduction of Task 4.1 (Extremes and climate). - the results derived from these tasks. - Concluding remarks

result.title: Analysis of Societal Acceptance and Ethical Acceptability - Issue 3
result.description: Thorough analysis of societal acceptance and ethical acceptability including empirical research with key stakeholders and the general public. The output of this will be in the form of points to consider for the ethical use of the system which will be regularly checked. By M42 a detailed ethics report with information on acceptable use of the system in different scenarios will be available.

result.title: Situation Assessment, Decision Support and Scenario Matching – Updated Concepts
result.description: The products and services documented in D6.7, D6.10 and D6.14 have been implemented for the HEIMDALL system releases A-C and the final release. However, during the EUWs and intermediary discussions with the end users, further resp. refined user requirements have arisen. In T6.3, T6.4 and T6.5 we see potential for addressing some of these requirements by updated approaches and concepts. In this deliverable we want to document the updated Situation Assessment (T6.3), Decision Support (T6.4) and Scenario Matching (T6.5) approaches for strengthening end user capabilities.

result.title: Dissemination Activities Report - Issue 2
